net.rim.device.api.ui.component.progressindicator
Interface ProgressIndicatorListener

All Superinterfaces:
AdjustmentListener
public interface ProgressIndicatorListener
extends AdjustmentListener

Listener interface for processing notifications of changes in the data model of a progress. Add classes that implement this interface to a ProgressIndicatorModel in order to be notified of changes to that model.

Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

Method Summary
 void cancelled()
          Invoked when the current representation of progress has been cancelled.
 void reset()
          Invoked when the data model has been reset to its initial state.
 void resumed()
          Invoked when the data model has resumed progress, typically after a cancel.
 void setNonProgrammaticValue(int value)
          Invoked when the value in the data model has changed through non-programmatic means.
 
Methods inherited from interface net.rim.device.api.ui.AdjustmentListener
configurationChanged, valueChanged

Since:

Since:

setNonProgrammaticValue

void setNonProgrammaticValue(int value)
Invoked when the value in the data model has changed through non-programmatic means. This is normally invoked when the user directly changes the value.

Parameters:
value - The new value of the data model.
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0
